name: Little Big Fish
description:
Are you looking for a unique, engaging and fun game to play? Are you looking to be entertained? Look no further, Little Big Fish is one of the best games which is full of everything you need! Little Big Fish offers players a shipwreck of exciting features!

Dodge fish to survive: 
You must swim until you can swim no more. Dodge the fish and avoid being eaten! No one likes being fish dinner. The longer you survive, the better points and rewards you will get.

Difficulty increases with progression: 
The more points you get, the hungrier the fish become. You better watch out, those fish get faster the longer they go without food! I hope you're quick with your fingers. Don’t forget, the longer you survive, the more rewards you unlock!

Unlock exciting colours and styles of fish through gameplay: 
Look at all those pretty colours! Little Big Fish gives players a sharktank full of fish to unlock! The fish all come in unique shapes, colours and fins!

Keep a record: 
These stats allow you to unlock different features of the game.

Hard mode: 
Do you like a challenge? Why not give hard mode a go? Even the best of players can not get a high score in this mode. Test your skill and unlock special rewards exclusive to hard mode!

So, what are you waiting for? Warm-up your fingers and play Little Big Fish right now.
